product_name: K2 Indy Skis with Bindings - Kids' - 2013/2014
long_description: With a special design that emphasizes a forgiving flex to help your kids learn, the K2 Indy skis with bindings inspire confidence and teach kids why we love this sport-because it's fun! Unlike traditional kids' skis which are thick and inflexible to ensure the retention of binding screws, these skis feature fused binding plates and a flex suited to youngsters. Rockered tips and tails make learning to turn easy. Wide 70mm waist allows the skis to stay on top of crud and powder, so kids have more control in a variety of snow conditions. Torsion Box construction achieves a high degree of rebound and performance. Forgiving foam core helps absorb impacts and damp vibrations. Bindings feature a DIN range of 0.75 - 4.5, suited to young and lightweight skiers. Base or topsheet color may vary from online photo.
short_description: With a special design that emphasizes a forgiving flex to help your kids learn, the K2 Indy skis with bindings inspire confidence and teach kids why we love this sport-because it's fun!
